para.1: This site invites you to explore ancient stories and recorded teachings that have shaped how many people understand wisdom, purpose, and the way to live well.

jvideo.title: Meeting Jesus
jvideo.summary: Short videos introduce Jesus and invite you to observe his teachings and actions.

para.1: Jesus is one of the most talked-about figures in history, yet people reach very different conclusions about Him. As you watch this video, notice what Jesus says and does, and pay attention to the questions or reactions that surface for you.
para.2: Gather with others and take time to share what you noticed and what stood out as you watched.

ctc.title: Entering the Story
ctc.summary: This series follows a connected narrative that begins before people appear.

para.1: The series presents wisdom through an unfolding account of people, choices, and relationships with God across generations.
para.2: You are invited to read these accounts together and reflect on what they suggest about life, meaning, and responsibility.

life.title: Wisdom for Everyday Life
life.summary: This series explores practical themes such as relationships, integrity, forgiveness, and decision-making.

para.1: Jesus and his early followers spoke about everyday issues that many people still face today.
para.2: As you explore these themes together, consider what stands out to you and whether any of these ideas connect with your own experience of life.

ask.title: Questions and Conversation
ask.summary: If you have questions or would like to share your thoughts, you are welcome to start a conversation.

review.p1: Before we begin, let’s take a moment to review what you committed to last time.
review.p2: This helps us encourage each other and see how God is at work.
review.empty: You didn’t write any notes in Look Forward the last time we met. Taking a few notes can help you grow!
